question: Which of the following set is termed as epidemiological triad:
exp: Ans (b) Agent, host and environment. Ref: K. question: Kaplan Meier method is used for:
exp: Ans. is 'b' i. e. Survival The Kaplan-Meier estimator (also known as the product limit estimator) estimates the survival function from lifetime data. In medical research, it is used to measure the fraction of patients living for a certain amount of time after treatment.
